home.title: Home
home.name: Charlotte Isambert, 22 years old
home.text2: I am currently completing my last year of Engineering School at ISEP and my end-of-study internship as a React front-end developer.
home.text3: During my studies and internships, writing performant, beautiful and easy-to-read code became my very first goal.
home.text4: I also realised how much I loved working as part of a team.
home.text5: I am searching for a full-time engineer job, so if you think that we could be a great match don't hesitate to
